author: gdaniels
msg: * Small adjustment to config so we don't conflict with port 8080 by default when running jaxws-integration tests.
* Also fix up use of build.repository system property so that we don't get "null" when running from an IDE

author: mrglavas
msg: JAXP 1.4 now allows applications to call getElementTypeInfo() during an endElement()
callback. Modifying the implementation of TypeInfoProvider to allow it.
